Input data

Richard White

2018-10-12

inputdata.Rmd
library(sykdomspuls)
#> PACKAGE: sykdomspuls
#> Version 2019.01.08 at 10:41
#> Developed by Richard White
#> Department of Infectious Disease Epidemiology and Modelling
#> Norwegian Institute of Public Health
#> https://folkehelseinstituttet.github.io/dashboards_sykdomspuls/

sykdomspuls requres a specific raw data format. We require one (or less) rows for each structural variable:

print(as.character(sykdomspuls::VARS$REQ_DATA_RAW_STRUCTURAL))
#> character(0)

For each row, the variables saved in sykdomspuls::CONFIG$SYNDROMES and sykdomspuls::VARS$REQ_DATA_RAW_OTHER contain the number of consultations that occurred for that combination of structural variables.

print(as.character(sykdomspuls::CONFIG$SYNDROMES))
#>  [1] "c(\"influensa\", \"gastro\", \"respiratoryinternal\", \"respiratoryexternal\", \"lungebetennelse\", \"bronkitt\", \"consultWithInfluensa\", \"consultWithoutInfluensa\")"                                                                                                                                     
#>  [2] "c(\"influensa\", \"gastro\", \"respiratoryinternal\", \"respiratoryexternal\", \"lungebetennelse\", \"bronkitt\", \"consultWithInfluensa\", \"consultWithoutInfluensa\")"                                                                                                                                     
#>  [3] "c(TRUE, TRUE, TRUE, FALSE, TRUE, TRUE, FALSE, FALSE)"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         
#>  [4] "c(FALSE, TRUE, FALSE, TRUE, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE, FALSE)"                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
#>  [5] "list(\"Legekontakt\", c(\"Legekontakt\", \"Telefonkontakt\"), c(\"Legekontakt\", \"Telefonkontakt\"), c(\"Legekontakt\", \"Telefonkontakt\"), c(\"Legekontakt\", \"Telefonkontakt\"), c(\"Legekontakt\", \"Telefonkontakt\"), c(\"Legekontakt\", \"Telefonkontakt\"), c(\"Legekontakt\", \"Telefonkontakt\"))"
#>  [6] "c(\"syndrome\", \"syndrome\", \"syndrome\", \"syndrome\", \"syndrome\", \"syndrome\", \"consult\", \"consult\")"                                                                                                                                                                                              
#>  [7] "c(\"consultWithInfluensa\", \"consultWithoutInfluensa\", \"consultWithoutInfluensa\", \"consultWithoutInfluensa\", \"consultWithoutInfluensa\", \"consultWithoutInfluensa\", \"pop\", \"pop\")"                                                                                                               
#>  [8] "list(.Primitive(\"sum\"), .Primitive(\"sum\"), .Primitive(\"sum\"), .Primitive(\"sum\"), .Primitive(\"sum\"), .Primitive(\"sum\"), function (x, ...) \nUseMethod(\"mean\"), function (x, ...) \nUseMethod(\"mean\"))"                                                                                         
#>  [9] "c(\"Influensa\", \"Mage-tarm diagnose\", \"Øvre-luftvei diagnose\", \"Øvre-luftvei diagnose\", \"Lungebetennelse diagnose\", \"Bronkitt diagnose\", \"consultWithInfluensa\", \"consultWithoutInfluensa\")"                                                                                                   
#> [10] "c(\"Influensa\", \"Mage-tarm\", \"Luftvei\", \"Luftvei\", \"Lungebet\", \"Bronkitt\", \"ConsWithInf\", \"ConsWOInf\")"
print(as.character(sykdomspuls::VARS$REQ_DATA_RAW_OTHER))
#> character(0)

In total, we require the following variables:

print(as.character(sykdomspuls::VARS$REQ_DATA_RAW_ALL))
#> character(0)

We can use the function GenFakeDataRaw() to generate a set of fake data for municip5054.

d <- GenFakeDataRaw()
#> 2019-01-08 11:04:52 ☠☠Data files have been read!☠☠
#> 2019-01-08 11:04:52 ☠☠This is slow!☠☠
#> 2019-01-08 11:04:52 ✓ norwayPopulation is up to date.
#> 2019-01-08 11:04:52 ✓ norwayLocations is up to date.
#> 2019-01-08 11:04:52 ✓ norwayMunicipMerging is up to date.
print(d)
#>         age       date     Kontaktype  Praksis     municip influensa
#>      1: 0-4 2006-01-01 Telefonkontakt Fastlege municip1624         7
#>      2: 0-4 2006-01-02 Telefonkontakt Fastlege municip1624         9
#>      3: 0-4 2006-01-03 Telefonkontakt Fastlege municip1624         8
#>      4: 0-4 2006-01-04 Telefonkontakt Fastlege municip1624         4
#>      5: 0-4 2006-01-05 Telefonkontakt Fastlege municip1624         5
#>     ---                                                             
#> 227900: 65+ 2019-12-27    Legekontakt Legevakt municip5054         2
#> 227901: 65+ 2019-12-28    Legekontakt Legevakt municip5054         4
#> 227902: 65+ 2019-12-29    Legekontakt Legevakt municip5054         6
#> 227903: 65+ 2019-12-30    Legekontakt Legevakt municip5054         5
#> 227904: 65+ 2019-12-31    Legekontakt Legevakt municip5054         2
#>         gastro respiratoryinternal respiratoryexternal lungebetennelse
#>      1:      5                   8                   6               7
#>      2:      4                   2                   3               5
#>      3:      5                   4                   4               8
#>      4:      4                   3                   3               4
#>      5:      7                   7                   6               4
#>     ---                                                               
#> 227900:      5                   7                   3               6
#> 227901:      8                   4                   4               5
#> 227902:      3                   6                   8               3
#> 227903:      3                   6                   5               5
#> 227904:      6                  10                   5               7
#>         bronkitt consult
#>      1:        3      79
#>      2:        2      71
#>      3:        3      79
#>      4:        2      73
#>      5:        3      63
#>     ---                 
#> 227900:        4      74
#> 227901:        2      75
#> 227902:        3      79
#> 227903:        4      80
#> 227904:        4      85

And we can then use the function ValidateDataRaw() to ensure that our fake data is in the correct format:

print(ValidateDataRaw(d))
#> [1] TRUE
